name: Connected! 2
description:
Minimalistic puzzle game. Connect the opposite sides of the same color by rotating the tiles. Each level is randomly generated, but guaranteed to be solvable.

How to play

You are challenged to bring order into the jumbled mix of lines and curves by connecting the opposite sides of the same color. Clicking a tile in the grid rotates the lines and curves in it. Colors will follow the lines.


You may need to find spots to cross the lines or build loops.

It's random!

Each level is randomly generated, so solving even a small grid can vary wildly between being quite straight-forward to being a real challenge!

Only one thing is for sure: there is at least one solution for ALL of the shown levels. That's a promise!

Features

  • Multiple grid sizes and numbers of lines to connect
  • Share levels solved or as a challenge with your friends
  • Endless random levels await being solved
